entries.description: Don't attempt to use empty session tokens
This release adds support for component system resource limits and idempotent Create operations. You can now specify the maximum amount of CPU and memory resources that each component can use.
Setting default content type to 'application/json' since the service does not accept 'x-amz-json-<version>'

entries.category: AWS Systems Manager Incident Manager Contacts
entries.description: Added new attribute in AcceptCode API. AcceptCodeValidation takes in two values - ENFORCE, IGNORE. ENFORCE forces validation of accept code and IGNORE ignores it which is also the default behavior; Corrected TagKeyList length from 200 to 50
